title: Instructional Material Development Competency Enhancement Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in using basic digital tools and educational experience
context.additional_context: Training for managers/leaders conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, emphasizing practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Trainees can identify and explain three or more key experiential elements (lack of technical skills, absence of design experience, etc.) occurring during instructional material development using phenomenological research methods
Trainees can collaboratively develop smartphone-based instructional material prototypes step-by-step with peers
Trainees can apply qualitative analysis frameworks (interviews, observation records analysis, etc.) to evaluate the effectiveness of developed instructional materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
